title: Quarto Extensions
text:
This article is a placeholder for documentation on the (yet to be developed) Quarto extension system.
Our plan is to provide facilities for creating the following extension types:







Type
Description




Document Format                    
New formats derived from the built in pandoc formats. For example, PDF formats that enable creating articles using the LaTeX templates of various journals (much like the rticles suite of custom R Markdown formats)


Project Format
Output formats for website or book Quarto Projects (both still under development).


Document Template
Pandoc templates and scaffold content for documents (e.g. to provide a common structure or look and feel across documents).


Document Filter
Pandoc Lua filters for low-level transformation of the Pandoc AST.
